overview:
Mason Sexton co-founded Moonit in September 2009 and has served as President since that time. He has been the lead product architect since the Company was founded and is heavily involved in all new product updates and features.

Mason hold a B.A. in Political Science from the University of Pennsylvania, where he graduated with distinction and recently obtained his MBA from Columbia University.

Prior to founding Moonit, Mason worked in finance, first as a banking analyst focusing mostly on the early stage financing of both tech and pharma companies. After that he spent time as a buy side equity analyst covering a few industries including tech and digital media. He also worked at Youthstream Media Networks, the largest college marketing firm at the time, which was subsequently acquired by Alloy.
